name: Dream Carnival
description:
Dreamt of owning your very own carnival?

Welcome to Dream Carnival, where you play as a carnival owner and run the day-to-day operations. Unlock new rides, food stalls, and activity areas to expand your carnival. The more attractions you unlock, the more customers you attract. Run the carnival in the most efficient way to make more profits.

----------------------------
How to Play?
----------------------------
-Unlock new rides and it’s upgrades
-Unlock food stalls and serve food to the customers
-Hire helpers to make your carnival business profitable
-Expand your carnival by unlocking more attractions

--------------------------
Game Features
--------------------------

-Simple controls
-Cartoony and bright graphics
-Multiple attractions to unlock
- Unique player and staff helper upgrades

So let’s make the most efficiently run and profitable carnival!
